Control Statement: An appropriate set of procedures for information labelling shall be developed and implemented in accordance with the information classification scheme adopted by the organization.The cloud service customer should label information and\nassociated assets maintained in the cloud computing environment in accordance with the cloud service customer's adopted procedures for labelling.
